name: Wizard Plus
overview: Wizard Plus is a clone of the arcade classic Wizard of Wor. In Wizard Plus you can either choose to go it alone or play with a friend. In winding Dungeons go on a monster hunt. Monsters fill the corridors but you can take them out with carefully placed shots. Released as part of Happy Computer 1989/01, 64'er Sonderheft 62, and again in 64'er 1999/01. The game was also re-released under the name Dungeon Warriors in Magic Disk 64 1995/12 with significant changes to music, graphics and with additional code from Victor Brønstad.
